data.eml:eml: Cardiocondyla atalanta Forel, 1915, a cryptic sister species of Cardiocondyla nuda (Mayr, 1866) (Hymenoptera: Formicidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Seifert, B. (2008): Cardiocondyla atalanta Forel, 1915, a cryptic sister species of Cardiocondyla nuda (Mayr, 1866) (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Myrmecologische Nachrichten 11: 43-48, URL: http://hdl.handle.net/10199/16668
